name: WOTEU Press
author: lafhq

sections.description:
Displays account data from Wargaming.net. Now is statistic from your profile in World of Tanks game available.
This is a updated version of the WOT press plugin by LimeiraStudio.

Translations

WOT Press distributes with translations for the following languages:

  • English
  • German
  • Russian
  • Ukrainian
  • Dutch

Requirements

  • PHP 5.2.0 or newer
sections.installation:
1. Upload the folder woteu-press to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Add the widget to your sidebar from Appearance->Widgets and configure the widget options.
  • The widget can be overwritten using another user name.
  • The admin config page is used to set some defaults.
sections.faq:
Do You have short Code(s) to use on my page?

Yes, its crude but works!
* [woteu-press_shortcode] (will use the default)
* [woteu-press_shortcode nickname=”PlayerName”]
sections.changelog:
0.1

  • Initial release

0.2

  • New api links used changed to eu server(s).
